trans-unit.source: A catalog that combines the elements of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Catalogo che combina gli elementi di oggetti <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" />.

trans-unit.source: This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Questo tipo implementa il <xref:System.IDisposable> interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver utilizzato il tipo, è necessario eliminarlo direttamente o indirettamente.

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: Per eliminare direttamente il tipo, chiamare il relativo <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> metodo in un `try` / `catch` blocco.

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Per eliminarlo indirettamente, utilizzare un costrutto di linguaggio come ad esempio `using` in C# o `Using` in Visual Basic.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere la sezione "Utilizzo di oggetti che implementano IDisposable" nel <xref:System.IDisposable> argomento relativo all'interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" /> objects to add to the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> or <see langword="null" /> to create an empty <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" />.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di oggetti <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" /> da aggiungere all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> o <see langword="null" /> per creare un oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> vuoto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> class with the specified catalogs.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> con i cataloghi specificati.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="catalogs" /> contains an element that is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="catalogs" /> contiene un elemento <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: A array of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" /> objects to add to the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" />.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di oggetti <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" /> da aggiungere a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> class with the specified catalogs.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> con i cataloghi specificati.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="catalogs" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="catalogs" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="catalogs" /> contains an element that is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="catalogs" /> contiene un elemento <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying catalogs of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene i cataloghi sottostanti dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" /> objects that underlie the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di oggetti <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog" /> sottostante all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> object has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the contents of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> object have changed.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica in seguito alla modifica del contenuto dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the contents of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> object are changing.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica durante la modifica del contenuto dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> per rilasciare sia le risorse gestite sia quelle non gestite; <see langword="false" /> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite usate da <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> e, facoltativamente, le risorse gestite.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the catalog.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un enumeratore che scorre il catalogo.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator that can be used to iterate through the catalog.
trans-unit.target: Enumeratore che può essere utilizzato per scorrere il catalogo.

trans-unit.source: The conditions of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" /> objects to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Condizioni degli oggetti <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" /> da restituire.

trans-unit.source: Gets the export definitions that match the constraint expressed by the specified definition.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le definizioni delle esportazioni che corrispondono al vincolo espresso dalla definizione specificata.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Tuple`2" /> containing the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" /> objects and their associated <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition" /> objects for objects that match the constraint specified by <paramref name="definition" />.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di <see cref="T:System.Tuple`2" /> contenente oggetti <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition" /> e relativi oggetti <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition" /> associati per oggetti che corrispondono al vincolo specificato da <paramref name="definition" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> object has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog" /> è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="definition" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="definition" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartCatalogChangeEventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartCatalogChangeEventArgs" /> contenente i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog.Changed" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera l'evento <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog.Changed" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartCatalogChangeEventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartCatalogChangeEventArgs" /> contenente i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog.Changing" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera l'evento <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AggregateCatalog.Changing" />.
